creator: tekenaar: Mignard, Pierre (1612-1695)
title: Ontwerp voor een plafond met koepel

description: Animal shaped kendi. The body has the shape of an elephant, with a raised head and the spout in the shape of two tusks. The upright neck is incomplete. The body is decorated with a cloth with a design of flowers and fine diaper patterns and bands with bells and whisks. Around the neck flowers are painted. The decoration is painted in a similar finely pencilled style as that of the winepots (type 1.5.1).
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Kendi uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A bowl with a cover. The interior is undecorated. The outside is decorated with a stylized landscape with hills, water and pagodas. The cover has the same type of decoration.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom met deksel uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

formats: techniek: penseel in bruin en grijs
creator: tekenaar: Silvestre, Israël
title: Het Kapitool te Rome

description: A winepot with a handle and a spout. The panels decorated with peonies and symbols. Shoulder and cover are decorated with floral sprays on a fine diaper pattern. The handle is decorated with various motives: dots and flower sprays. The spout with flame motives and stylized jewels and the cover with floral sprays and cartouches on diaper pattern. The neck with sketchy flower sprays.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Ketel uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
subject: Iconclasscode: 48A9833

description: A kendi with a rounded side. Decorated with birds and flowers under a band with diaper patterns. The neck decorated with plantain leaves, the spout with peaches and groups of dots in sections.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Kendi uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
